comments:
when running ant in Eclipse 3.1M3 i get following error:

java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: org.eclipse.debug.ui.console.IConsole.addLink
(Lorg/eclipse/ui/console/IHyperlink;II)V
	at 
org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.launchConfigurations.TaskLinkManager.addLink
(TaskLinkManager.java:151)
	at 
org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.launchConfigurations.TaskLinkManager.processNewLine
(TaskLinkManager.java:186)
	at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.console.TaskLineTracker.lineAppended
(TaskLineTracker.java:43)
	at 
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.console.ConsoleLineNotifier.processNewLines
(ConsoleLineNotifier.java:133)
	at 
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.console.ConsoleLineNotifier.consoleChanged
(ConsoleLineNotifier.java:80)
	at 
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.console.ConsoleDocumentPartitioner.documentC
hanged2(ConsoleDocumentPartitioner.java:368)

I think it's because the IFileLink of the org.eclipse.debug.ui.console package 
is still used in this class file. The IConsole.addLink method expects an 
IHyperlink from the org.eclipse.ui.console.IHyperlink package but 
org.eclipse.debug.ui.console.FileLink implements 
org.eclipse.debug.ui.console.IHyperlink

There's already a related bugreport #73957 

I report this extra because i think it can be solved in the ant package and it 
is severe

To be more clear:

TaskLinkManager.addLink calls the method IConsole.addLink with a 
org.eclipse.debug.ui.console.IHyperlink instead of 
org.eclipse.ui.console.IHyperlink in certain cases ( i think when a FileLink is 
used )

This has been reworked on the way to M4 and I have not seen this problem in 
testing.

If you have the time could you please try your test case on I20041201 and 
report back?

The error is still there in I20041201 for my installation

but org.eclipse.debug.ui.console.FileLink is extending IConsoleHyperlink of the 
debug.ui extending itself org.eclipse.ui.console.IHyperlink.

so everything should be ok

I'll try to do a test on another machine
